decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
REASON:  To comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.
Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents: Title Sheet 01, Photo Views 02, Site Plan 03, Ground Floor 04, First & Roof 05, Elevations 06, Elevations 07, Ground Floor 11 Revision A, First Floor 12 Revision A, Loft Floor 13 Revision A, Roof Plan 14 Revision A, Elevations 15 A, Elevations 16 A, Heritage Statement 17, Site Plan Fire Statement Notes 18, Reasonable Exemption Statement. 

REASON: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
REASON: To safeguard the character and appearance of the area in accordance with Core Policy CS1.B of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s), other than those shown on the approved plans shall be installed in the flank elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

REASON: To safeguard the residential  amenities of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 5 - The window(s) in the flank elevation(s) of the proposed development shall:
(a) be of purpose-made obscure glass,
(b) be permanently fixed closed below a height of 1.7m above finished floor level,
and shall thereafter be retained in that form.
REASON: To safeguard the residential  amenities of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 6 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
REASON: To safeguard the residential  amenities of neighbouring residents, in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 7 - Notwithstanding the drawings hereby approved, the new roof lights to the main dwellinghouse, rear extension and converted garage shall sit flush with their respective roof surfaces.

REASON: To safeguard the character and appearance of the locality and the Pinnerwood Park Estate Conservation Area in accordance with Core Policies CS1.B and CS1.D of the Harrow Core Strategy (2012) and Policies DM1 and DM7 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
Condition : 8 - The converted outbuilding hereby permitted shall only be used for purposes which are incidental to the enjoyment of the host dwelling at No. 530 Uxbridge Road, Hatch End, Pinner, HA5 3PU, and shall not be used as separate self contained accommodation or as an office which would accommodate multiple employees and/or would be open for public visitation.

REASON: To safeguard the amenity of neighbouring residents and the character of the locality in accordance with Policy DM1 of the Harrow Development Management Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: Single Storey Rear Extension; Conversion Of Garage Into Habitable Room with associated external alterations; Installation Of New Windows To Side Elevation; Installation Of two Rooflights In Rear Roofslope, new electric car charging point.
